message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to assess the quality of arguments. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper proposes neural methods based on language models, which falls under the sub-categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves classification tasks, which can be categorized under Information Retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper deals with the subjective nature of the task, which can be related to the sub-category of Cybernetics (cs.CY).
